extendedInfo.description: If you are Boys Like Girls's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Boys Like Girls's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Boys Like Girls's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Boys Like Girls's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - Boys Like Girls- Love Drunk- Crazy World-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - Be Your Everything- Broken Man- Cheated- Chemicals Collide- Contagious- Crazy World- Dance Hall Drug- Five Minutes To Midnight- Go- Heart Heart Heartbreak- Heels Over Head- Hero/Heroine- Hey You- Holiday- Learning To Fall- Leaving California- Life Of The Party- Love Drunk- Me, You And My Medication- On Top Of The World- Real Thing- Red Cup- She's Got A Boyfriend Now- Shoot- Someone Like You- Stuck In The Middle- Take Me Home- The First One- The First Time- The Great Escape- The Shot Heard 'Round The World- Thunder- Two Is Better Than One- Up Against The Wall
